rules_text:
Artillery [i](This creature gets +1/+1 for each Equipment attached to it.)[/i]
Whenever Catlin, the Treasurer deals combat damage to a player, put that many colorless artifact tokens named Loot onto the battlefield. They have “Sacrifice this artifact: Add {1} to your mana pool.”
flavor_text: [i]Each piece of jewelry commemorates a profitable trade.[/i]
